medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of absence of pubertal development began during adolescence. Sibling A experienced profound bilateral sensorineural hearing loss, while all siblings had a history of hypogonadotropic hypogonadism with delayed puberty. Symptoms varied among siblings in their intensity and associated phenotypic anomalies.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Family history of probable Kallmann syndrome; sibling B treated with androgens, sibling C with absence of pubertal development.
medical_history.family_history: History of probable Kallmann syndrome among siblings; sibling A (18 years), sibling B (24 years), and sibling C (15 years) affected.
medical_history.social_history: Sibling A was reared in an institution for the deaf and dumb; sibling A is a horticulturist.
